channel.title: Jira on Johnny Ting
channel.description: Recent content in Jira on Johnny Ting

item.title: 搭建Jira 已破解
item.description: 参考链接 1.下载Jira wget https://product-downloads.atlassian.com/software/jira/downloads/atlassian-jira-software-8.0.2.tar.gz 2.解压 tar -zxvf atlassian-jira-software-8.0.2.tar.gz 3.下载数据库对应的jdbc驱动，对应目录/home/uugm/workspace/atlassi
